properties.name: livecontext.max-category-segments
properties.description: The maximum number of seo segments that should be used for product urls.

properties.name: livecontext.cookie.domain
properties.description: The cookie domain under which the cae should deliver fragments.

properties.name: livecontext.slp.segmentPath
properties.description: Segment path root for search landing pages (SLPs). SLPs contents are resolved below this path..
